format: TypeScript (TSX for React components and Next.js specific functions)
description: This file defines a Next.js page component for displaying detailed information about a recipe, including metadata, images, ingredients, instructions, and reviews. It also includes functions for generating static routes and metadata for dynamic routing.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Generates static route parameters for all recipes by fetching their IDs.

methods.name: generateMetadata
methods.description: Fetches recipe data to generate dynamic metadata for the recipe page, with fallback if fetch fails.
